amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the rebuttable presumption under section 203, stating that all qualified safe harbor loans that meet the requirements listed in section 203(c)(3)(C) fall under the safe harbor.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 110-450 to strike the rebuttable presumption under section 203, stating that all qualified safe harbor loans that meet the requirements listed in section 203(c)(3)(C) fall under the safe harbor.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 229 (Roll no. 1115).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Garrett (NJ).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
